Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.22743126]Porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome virus(PRRSV):inhibition of PRRSV replication in MARC-145 cells(IC50=43.50202 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: PRRSV polymerase is an RNA-dependent RNA polymerase and is an enzyme specific to viruses, RNA-dependent RNA polymerase is one of the most important proteins for intracellular replication of viruses.The peptide could exert antiviral activity by inhibiting polymerase.

Literature.Title: Antiviral activity of phage display selected peptides against Porcine reproductive and respiratory syndrome virus in vitro.
Literature.Author: Liu K, Feng X, Ma Z, Luo C, Zhou B, Cao R, Huang L, Miao D, Pang R, He D, Lian X, Chen P.
